title: We need a Top/ADC for ranked 5s.
body:
We are currently pushing into gold 5, we just need more reliable players to be online so we can actually play. Be atleast Silver 2+ , and have a large pool of champions if you play top lane.

Add me- Gryfindorr

replies.body: i could act as a sub top or adc, gold 2,
Top main but im dropped from g2 last seas to s4 this seas
